thread.title: Nigel and Liz Paterson
thread.title_full: Inish Pharmacy reviewed by Nigel and Liz Paterson

author: Nigel and Liz Paterson
title: Nigel and Liz Paterson
text: I was delighted to be able to order online from Inish Pharmacy. The experience was spoilt a bit at the last stage by the Royal Mail postman managing to deliver the product to a neighbour when I was in our home quietly waiting for the delivery to come. There are times like these when Royal Mail needs a gentle wake-up call, perhaps from Inish.
